metadata.title: CVE-2022-40743 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability for the xdebug plugin in ApacheSoftware Foundation Apache Traffic Server can lead to cross site scriptingand cache poisoning attacks.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: 9.0.0to 9.1.3. Users should upgrade to 9.1.4 or later versions.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
